Instance.description: The situation an employee of a retail store will run.

Tunable.name: employee_job
Tunable.description: The situation job for the employee.

TunableTuple.name: go_home_interaction
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that, when run on an employee, will have them end this situation and go home.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableTuple.name: go_to_store_interaction
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that, when run by an employee, will switch the situation state to start cleaning, upselling, restocking, etc.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

Tunable.name: role_state_go_to_store
Tunable.description: The role state for getting the employee inside the store. This is the default role state and will be run first before any other role state can start.

Tunable.name: role_state_go_to_store_timeout
Tunable.display: Role State Go To Store Timeout
Tunable.description: Automatically advance out of the role state after waiting for this duration. There's a number of reasons the employee can fail to exit the role state in a timely fashion, such as the register is blocked (by another employee clocking, even) and hijacked by a social.

TunableTuple.name: state_clean
TunableTuple.description: The state during which employees clean the store.

TunableTuple.name: push_interaction
TunableTuple.description: If an interaction of this type is run by the employee, this state will activate.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

Tunable.name: role_state
Tunable.description: The role state that is active on the employee for the duration of this state.

Tunable.name: timeout_max
Tunable.description: The maximum amount of time, in Sim minutes, the employee will be in this state before moving on to a new state.

Tunable.name: timeout_min
Tunable.description: The minimum amount of time, in Sim minutes, the employee will be in this state before moving on to a new state.

TunableTuple.name: state_restock
TunableTuple.description: The state during which employees restock items.

TunableTuple.name: push_interaction
TunableTuple.description: If an interaction of this type is run by the employee, this state will activate.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

Tunable.name: role_state
Tunable.description: The role state that is active on the employee for the duration of this state.

Tunable.name: timeout_max
Tunable.description: The maximum amount of time, in Sim minutes, the employee will be in this state before moving on to a new state.

Tunable.name: timeout_min
Tunable.description: The minimum amount of time, in Sim minutes, the employee will be in this state before moving on to a new state.

TunableTuple.name: state_ring_up_customers
TunableTuple.description: The state during which employees will ring up customers.

TunableTuple.name: push_interaction
TunableTuple.description: If an interaction of this type is run by the employee, this state will activate.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

Tunable.name: role_state
Tunable.description: The role state that is active on the employee for the duration of this state.

Tunable.name: timeout_max
Tunable.description: The maximum amount of time, in Sim minutes, the employee will be in this state before moving on to a new state.

Tunable.name: timeout_min
Tunable.description: The minimum amount of time, in Sim minutes, the employee will be in this state before moving on to a new state.

TunableTuple.name: state_slack_off
TunableTuple.description: The state during which employees slack off.

TunableTuple.name: push_interaction
TunableTuple.description: If an interaction of this type is run by the employee, this state will activate.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

Tunable.name: role_state
Tunable.description: The role state that is active on the employee for the duration of this state.

Tunable.name: timeout_max
Tunable.description: The maximum amount of time, in Sim minutes, the employee will be in this state before moving on to a new state.

Tunable.name: timeout_min
Tunable.description: The minimum amount of time, in Sim minutes, the employee will be in this state before moving on to a new state.

TunableTuple.name: state_socialize
TunableTuple.description: The state during which employees socialize with customers.

TunableTuple.name: push_interaction
TunableTuple.description: If an interaction of this type is run by the employee, this state will activate.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

Tunable.name: role_state
Tunable.description: The role state that is active on the employee for the duration of this state.

Tunable.name: timeout_max
Tunable.description: The maximum amount of time, in Sim minutes, the employee will be in this state before moving on to a new state.

Tunable.name: timeout_min
Tunable.description: The minimum amount of time, in Sim minutes, the employee will be in this state before moving on to a new state.

TunableTuple.name: total_work_time
TunableTuple.description: The amount of time in sim minutes an employee will work before leaving for the day.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableList.name: total_work_time_buffs
TunableList.description: A mapping from percentage duration worked to buffs applied to employees working more than this amount. Buffs don't stack; the higher percentage buff is the applied one.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The percentage duration worked.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: The buff applied to employees working over the specified amount.

TunableVariant.name: buff_reason
TunableVariant.description: If set, specify a reason why the buff was added.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The reason the buff was added. This will be displayed in the buff tooltip.

Tunable.name: buff_type
Tunable.description: Buff that will get added to sim.
